@@ -21,25 +21,26 @@
         try {
           console.log("ðŸ“¡ Consultando banco de dados para:", email);
           
           const query = `
-            SELECT id, nome, sobrenome, email, id_carteirinha, data_ultimo_voucher, senha
-            FROM clientes
-            WHERE email = $1
+  SELECT id, nome, sobrenome, email, id_carteirinha, data_ultimo_voucher, senha
+  FROM clientes
+  WHERE email = $1
+
+  UNION ALL
+
+  SELECT id, nome_empresa AS nome, NULL AS sobrenome, email, NULL AS id_carteirinha, NULL AS data_ultimo_voucher, senha
+  FROM parceiros
+  WHERE email = $1
+
+  UNION ALL
+
+  SELECT id, 'Admin' AS nome, NULL AS sobrenome, email, NULL AS id_carteirinha, NULL AS data_ultimo_voucher, senha
+  FROM admins
+  WHERE email = $1
+`;
+
       
-            UNION
-      
-            SELECT id, email, senha AS "password", 'parceiro' AS role
-            FROM parceiros
-            WHERE email = $1
-      
-            UNION
-      
-            SELECT id, email, senha AS "password", 'admin' AS role
-            FROM admins
-            WHERE email = $1
-          `;
-      
           const result = await pool.query(query, [email]);
       
           console.log("ðŸ” Resultado da Query:", result.rows);
